org.br.game.sprites
Class CirclingBallGroup

java.lang.Object
  org.br.game.SpriteBase
      org.br.game.GroupedSprite
          org.br.game.sprites.CirclingBallGroup
All Implemented Interfaces:
Sprite
public class CirclingBallGroup
extends GroupedSprite

The concrete implementation of GroupedSprite with the group of 2 moving ball sprites. One of the sprites is still, the second circles around it.
